name: places/ChIJ7bBbRvRZwokRp_G11ijBkXM
formattedAddress: 926 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA
adrFormatAddress: 926 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10021, USA

originalText.text: This is a review of the product, not of the store itself.   I purchased the short sleeve polo shirt from the website when it was on sale for $37 down from $125 (regular price).  I received the shirt with a slight stain on it.  I contacted customer service, and they stated that I could return it for a refund, but they ran out of that particular color that was on sale.   I was able to remove the stain in the 1st and only wash, but then the shirt was not sturdy enough to last one wash cycle.  One wash and air drying resulted in a small hole in the garment.  So, I said, Ok, then how about replacing it with another color?  No dice! But, hey we can give you credit to purchase towards a full price polo!   Huh??  I am disappointed that the company has all of this discussion about high end suppliers, and taking care of the customers and all this, and they aren't willing to honor their customer when they provide a defective product.   Mind you this is my first purchase from Sid Mashburn.  The material did seem nice as it seemed very similar to a Peter Miller Polo that I have as well, but what kind of customer service is this to not provide a polo when it's defective? It seems that the customer service and all the statements of quality are smoke and mirrors.

originalText.text:
Top notch quality menswear, excellent
service, and terrific music to shop by. A great find!

originalText.text: Very nice shop! Service was very friendly and the clothes are beautiful. Men & Women's.
